Class TrackListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrackListController

  • public class TrackListController
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for performing operations on or generating ArrayLists of Tracks for other parts in the application. In particular, performing set operations used by the Search class as well as importing and exporting files.
    Author:
    Scott Beale

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrackListController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Track> exclude(java.util.ArrayList<Track> mustBe, java.util.ArrayList<Track> cantBe)
      Finds the difference of mustBe and cantBe
      static void exportM3u(java.util.ArrayList<Track> playlist)
      Writes a List of tracks into an .m3u file which can be imported into Virtual DJ or iTunes If Virtual DJ is present on the user's computer, defaults to placing new playlists into Virtual DJs playlist folder, allowing them to be quickly accessed.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Tag> getCommonTags(java.util.ArrayList<Track> tracksIn)
      Finds all Tags shared by every Track in the passed ArrayList
      static Search importM3UPlayList()
      Opens a file chooser to import a M3U playlist.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Track> importToSnap()
      Opens a file chooser to select a collection of .mp3 file or a folder.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Track> intersect(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Track>> toIntersect)
      Finds the intersection of each ArrayList of Tracks passed in.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Track> merge(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Track>> toMerge)
      Finds the union of each ArrayList of Tracks passed in.

      • merge

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Track> merge(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Track>> toMerge)
        Finds the union of each ArrayList of Tracks passed in.
        Parameters:
        toMerge - Contains ArrayLists of Tracks that are merged (union).
        Returns:
        The union of every set of toMerge

      • intersect

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Track> intersect(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Track>> toIntersect)
        Finds the intersection of each ArrayList of Tracks passed in.
        Parameters:
        toIntersect - Contains ArrayLists of Tracks that are intersected.
        Returns:
        the intersection of every set of toIntersect

      • exclude

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Track> exclude(java.util.ArrayList<Track> mustBe,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<Track> cantBe)
        Finds the difference of mustBe and cantBe
        Parameters:
        mustBe - set of Tracks whose presence is required for inclusion in returned set
        cantBe - set of Tracks whose presence is forbidden from inclusion in returned set
        Returns:
        a ArrayList containing every member that is in mustBe and is not in cantBe

      • getCommonTags

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Tag> getCommonTags(java.util.ArrayList<Track> tracksIn)
        Finds all Tags shared by every Track in the passed ArrayList
        Parameters:
        tracksIn - the Tracks whose common Tags are found.
        Returns:
        Every Tag shared by every Track of tracksIn.

      • importM3UPlayList

        public static Search importM3UPlayList()
        Opens a file chooser to import a M3U playlist. Parses the .m3U file and imports every .mp3 file not already present into the Library. Adds a tag with name 'list:[FileName]' to every Track in the .m3u file. Saves a search for that tag in Saved searches
        Returns:
        Search for new Tag created and added to every Track of playlist

      • importToSnap

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Track> importToSnap()
        Opens a file chooser to select a collection of .mp3 file or a folder. If files are selected, adds those Tracks to the database. If a folder is selected, adds any .mp3 files contained in that folder or lower as Tracks to the database.
        Returns:
        List of new Tracks successfully added to the database

      • exportM3u

        public static void exportM3u(java.util.ArrayList<Track> playlist)
        Writes a List of tracks into an .m3u file which can be imported into Virtual DJ or iTunes If Virtual DJ is present on the user's computer, defaults to placing new playlists into Virtual DJs playlist folder, allowing them to be quickly accessed.
        Parameters:
        playlist -
